description: Creates a DRAFT version of the agent that can be used for internal testing.

parameters.name: agentId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the agent for which to create a DRAFT version.

nested_items.name: agentId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the agent for which the DRAFT version was created.

nested_items.name: agentStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the DRAFT version and whether it is ready for use.

nested_items.name: preparedAt
nested_items.description: The time at which the DRAFT version of the agent was last prepared.
